Now how smart is it to bite a 45 foot tall bot's hand?

::Oblitertron::

Oblitertron feels a small jolt of pain in his fingers as Squizzy 
bites him, the gestalt growling. He looks over at DevilDuer.

"Can you calm her down?" the bot asks, lowering his hand so that 
Squizzy was about 10 feet away from DevilDuer. DevilDuer nods, firing 
his stun gun at her.

"There ya go," DevilDuer says, turning back to fire at Arcangel.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Squizzy::
> 
> She struggled, "LET ME GO! PUT ME DOWN!" She gringed as his hand 
> rubbed against the burnt skin and stung.  She still tried to get 
> free. She shook her head and wished she had a weapon.  She bit down 
> on his hand as hard as she could, she didn't have a weapon, but she 
> still had her strong, sharp teeth.
>
